评论详情: 5’11, 250 lbs, 40 DDD. Dress fit perfectly! And it’s so much prettier in person. I love it!
The zipper is sewn in wrong and makes the entire dress bunch up

评论概述: Light weight and easy to adjust
评论详情: Not only is the design cute and not gonna fade as soon as you put it in the washing machine but also can withstand the dryer. Very pleased with how easy it was to adjust for my frame and im sure if i have a friend or cousin i want to donate it to, itll be easy for them to dawn it cause adjustments are basically right there in your face. Easy to layer with as well so makes a wonderful winter addition.
Step daughter wore this for our galaxy themed wedding and it looked beautiful on her!
Just what i was loking for
Material was okay. Fit was true.

This thing is long!! I don't understand how they can advertise this as a mini dress. It goes past my knees. I'm 5 ft 5. The only way this is going to be a mini dress is if you're 6'4. I definitely won't be buying from this company again. Returning!!
Bought this dress to celebrate mine and my husband's 13 yr anniversary and it fits perfectly.absolutely stunning dress.great quality material and the style is absolutely fitting for a petite person.
The print and fit were pretty good, but the fabric felt costumey.

Print was clear. Fitting was as described. The side ribbons helps with the overall figure. Only negative is the metal holding the ribbons like to move. It is rather short. It fails the picking up a dropped pencil without showing your underwear test, so lost pencils shall forever be out of reach in this dress. But it's cute and you can run away in it.
Dress looked nothing like picture in person. The pattern was way bigger than shown, and the material was a cheap swimsuit like polyester. Very disappointed
Cute dress, nice quality fabric. Not a flattering fit to be worn. So I just sits in my closet.

I was worried about buying a Large and not a XL but Amazon recommended it so I trusted it. To my surprise it was stretchy! The fabric is of poor quality though, I would say this dress is worth $20 not $40! A bra is very much required!

5’4, 156lbs, 34DDD I got a large. The picture made me think it was almost like a canvas like fabric but it’s that cheap thin polyester stuff. Still a very cute dress just make sure you buy the right size because you lose the print if it’s stretched too much.
Nice lines, but order a size up or the fabric stretches and looks grey instead of black.
The material didn’t look like the advertisement the design were  quite off for example one of the suns on the dress was big centered in the middle of the dress which is awkward looking.
Slimming and true to fit. Very nice dress
Thin fabric

评论概述: Thin material but can be flattering
评论详情: The material is deceptively thin, and if not sized appropriately, could appear sheer in places. I do like the corset-like lacing at the sides, as it adds another layer of customization to the dress. You can cinch the laces to change the length and fit of the dress.

评论概述: Decent dress but material is not as good.
评论详情: The look and fit are decent. Material can use improvement. I did not end up wearing it to the event after all but now I plan on making it my halloween costume next year and be an Octopus.
Hated the material and it didn’t look as cute in person.
Would suggest to buy a size or two bigger

评论概述: It's cute but different than expected
评论详情: I really wanted to like this dress more, but it's that shiny/stretchy/slightly see-through material and it's difficult to work with to get the dress to lay in a nice way. The zipper caused some shape issues as well, couldn't have it all the way up but also can't have it slightly unzipped
Terrible quality and fits so poorly.

I went to a oddities expo recently and then out to eat and walking and this dress was so comfortable. I got a lot of compliments. It is well constructed and even though it zips up it is easy to adjust. The material is soft and feels good against the skin so I was comfortable walking in the convention center, sitting down to eat and walking in Chinatown. A must have if uou like dresses like these.

评论概述: use the size chart to pick your size
评论详情: I just received this and tried it on, and it fits perfectly.  I ordered a large, per the size chart measurements.  I'm 5'1" tall and weigh 140 lbs.  I ordered per the bust measurement, because I'm large there and the side ribbons let you draw it in around the ribs / waist.  I usually wear a size 6 or 8 in dresses.

Im 150, 5'6 and ordered a large. If this dress was $20 I'd keep it, but for this price I'm dissapointed with the fabric placement and style of it. It bunches really bad around the zipper because of where the clasps for the ribbon are placed and no extra fabric around the bottom half to create the flow look in the photos.

I like the idea of this dress and it looks quite cute in photos but it’s very cheaply made and I don’t expect to last too long. I also don’t like the cheap quality of the zipper on the chest area, it’s bends in a weird way. I just wish it was made of a thicker and different material. But overall still cute.

评论概述: Not as great as I was hoping for.
评论详情: I was really hoping this would be more flattering. The top fits weird but I can't wear these kind of straps to work anyway, so I put a crop top over it. Fabric is of ok quality but on the cheap side.
FEAPHY Women's Gothic Dress (galaxy black) - $35.99 Size was spot on (large) and material does not feel cheap. A beautiful dress.
This top has a great stretch. But it fits a little large to me. Too much space in the breast area. But it is definitely a really cute top. The lace-up is nice. But again the fit is a little off.
I ordered my regular size in women's, but it was still waaaaay too small. Material is cheap too.
This would be cute considering the design and style. It doesn’t fit nice and looks cheaply made with the straps and buckles, maybe could be worn as a swimsuit?

评论概述: Minor loose threads, fits well for petite women, looks better with a bra on
评论详情: For reference, I am 5’, 32D, 105-110 lbs, waist 26” and hips 31”. The dress had some very minor loose threads sticking out on the straps and by the zipper which I cut and burned off. The black ribbon was too long so I had to cut them as well so they wouldn’t drag so long. I like the ribbon as it allows me to tighten the dress for a more form fitting shape. Attached are various photos of when I wore a push up bra and no bra. The dress does not have any cups or padding so if you want cleavage, I would recommend a black or strapless bra. I threw this in the wash and put it in the garment bag because I didn’t want the ribbons getting tied around my other clothes. It came out same size as when I bought it. It can be hard to find the right fit for me as I tend to wear extra small. This one fit very well, would buy other patterns as long as they have the corset like feature to tighten around waist and hips.
Love this dress and it fits great

The material for this was straight spandex and it just made it look very cheap and unflatterying. without the side ties as a mini dress it could have worked, but with them it just looked like someone took a nice cotton/denom design and used cheaper materials. I'm returning it and going up in price to find something in cotton instead

评论概述: Cute but thin and more grey than black
评论详情: It's cute enough but the material is really thin, feels slightly cheap, and it's much more grey than the pictures. I prefer black so this was a bit of a bummer. Also very short (my whole booty is out if I lean over) so if you're wearing this go for some shorts underneath! True to size though and pretty comfortable to wear
Fits as expected and seems to be really nice material
Thin, cheap spandex, not fitted or even have seams in the way pictured. The chest part is awkward with the straps too close together, and I’m not even a busty woman. Don’t waste your money.
Just as described, it has a slight give to it..
I love this so much. I got it in a 3x and it is the sized exactly. I really love the material of the dress, it fits me so well and even compliments my figure. 5 out of 5 for me.

评论概述: GORGEOUS! A new favorite of mine!
评论详情: For reference, I'm 5'4", 100 lbs, 32D. My measurements are 31-23-32 in inches (80-58-83 in cm), so I am a bit on the petite side. I got a small and it fit well, was just a little hard to zip over my bust.  Wow, this dress is so so so cute. I got so many compliments when I went out wearing it. The fabric is a little thin and feels satin-y; it’s a very light fabric so great for hot weather. I love how there’s a corset-like feel to the dress with the side lacing; you can pull it tight to make the dress more form-fitting or loosen them if you prefer a drapey look. The zip up in the front is so flattering and makes your chest look really good. I would recommend taking the ribbons out from the sides before washing, as they would probably get wrapped around your other clothes and cause a mess. Overall, I’m in love with this dress, and I hope to see more patterns soon!
Well made. Beautiful design. Soft.

The color is nice, but it runs small. Get a few sizes up if you want the design to not get stretched out. The straps are thin. I don't recommend this for larger chested women or full figured. It will ride up. I have to wear it with tights.
Very cute on. Fits good and us very comfortable.

I like this dress. The fabric is lightweight and very comfortable for summer in Florida. Others would probably argue that this is “cheap” fabric, but I already knew that it would be this type of fabric when I choose to order it. Even if its cheap, its still incredibly lightweight and comfortable in the hot summer. I feel like it fits me slightly smaller than I want it to, but its still perfectly comfortable. I wear a size 14-16 on average and got this in an XXL. I would say this fits more on the 14 side.

For 30 plus dollars I think the dress looks too cheap. It's that shiny material and going to replace the ribbon as well because I think the ribbon looks cheap as well. It's a cute dress but for price point just not there. It's a cool design and idea just the execution. Going to get some pretty good ribbon heavy duty and spruce it up a bit.

My wife loved the idea of this, but in practice she found it horribly ugly. In her words it looks like 'one step up from a Halloween costume'. It's cheaply made, the cut is unflattering (she has a great figure and it still looks bad on her), and there are questionable design choices such as the front zipper.  The one saving grace in her mind is that the side laces make it adjustable.

This dress fits so good! I just love the celestial design printed on it and the corset style ribbons on both sides. It's the perfect length and the zipper on the breast is trendy and cute. Definitely one of my new favorites to wear because it's really flattering and looks so nice! Recommend!
Material can be pretty stretchy but it stretched the pattern if so. Very cute tho!

The dress itself is well made and really cute, it has some stretch to it so it hugs the body right. It is not see through and it feels safe to wash in the washer. Though make sure to tie or remove the lace beforehand.

This looks good on but it is made of horrible fabric. It looks cheap because some of the design elements are just printed. This definitely doesn't look like the photo. It's not particularly comfortable. Would be good for a costume.

评论概述: Not for me but very cute
评论详情: This did not fit me :( but it’s probably my fault by misjudging sizes. (I am between sizes right now-humbling) Quality is very nice and it’s very very cute. Should def buy. Just read the size guide

I love it and how well made it is. And how it has the ribbons on the side for you to tie to give it that corset appearance all the while being super comfy and cute. I like the design of it and the zipper on the front it fit perfectly.

Super cute dress. I got this for my daughter. The style and design are cute. The side ties are a nice touch. The front zipper is not small and flimsy, it feels and looks good quality. I went with the manufacturer size chart and it fit her perfectly. It's light and comfortable. My daughter loves it.
This fits me perfectly. I think it is really cute. The material is comfortable and I love the side ties. I don't wear a lot of dresses but I really like this one.
fits well and has a beautiful design, my new favourite dress!!
